title: 04/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin breaks down the NFL Draft and lays out why it’s clear 1 of the top prospects is going to end up busting despite being compared to one of the all-time greats. He discusses the NBA playoffs with Anthony Davis expected to return from injury and why AD needs LeBron more than you think. He takes aim at anonymous NFL scouts for criticizing Trevor Lawrence when he’s clearly the best QB prospect in years. Plus, Ryen Russillo from The Ringer joins the show to tell Colin why he’s dead wrong about Anthony Davis.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
